fields.Title of Presentation: Paying it Forward: Candidate Contributions and Support for Diverse Candidates
fields.Conference/Meeting Name: Good Reasons to Run: A Conversation Between Advocates and Academics
fields.Description/Abstract: The conference, “Good Reasons to Run: A Conversation Between Advocates and Academics,” sought to advance research on how to encourage a more diverse group of candidates to run for political office. My research and presentation focused on how candidates can use their campaign funding to support other candidates. My work, along with the work of other conference participants, will become part of an edited book.
